title: Sampling Distribution of Sample Proportion: Ladies Dominate
question_text:
According to the 2014 U.S. census, $50.8\%$ of the people in the U.S. are females. A simple random sample of $200$ people in the United States were selected.
What is the probability that more than $52\%$ of the people selected were females?
